entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
